ygData.subject: Monk Strategy Guide....

ygData.messageBody:
Is there any Monk on this Club? <br><br>I'm 11
lvl, and I just realized that I had Tiger Claw, so I'm
using my monk as a hand-to-hand guy... but somebody
told me that this is not the strongest way of managing
a monk... the best way is using weapons. The other
thing is Tiger Claw better than Round Kick... or
what... Another payer told me not to carry much, in fact
less than 13 because i have repercusions.. does
anybody knows something about this...
